p: For biological assays, the Shapiro–Wilks normality test was performed in the data to ensure that it followed a normal distribution. Comparison between the means of controls and each experimental condition was performed using ANOVA. Outliers were identified by the Grubbs’ test. Data was expressed as the mean ± standard deviation (SD) of at least three independent experiments. GraphPad Prism 7.0 software was used, and values were considered statistically significant when p < 0.05.
